description: A mouthwatering, flavourful vegetarian dish with eggplant as the main ingredient. The rich tomato-based sauce will make this recipe a family favourite.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Eggplant,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Jul 2022,Budget,Halal,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Peanut free
name: Eggplant Parmigiana Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 80g Thomas Dux grana padano, finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220째C/200째C fan-forced. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper. Arrange eggplant, in a single layer, on trays. Brush with oil. Bake for 30 minutes, turning halfway through cooking, or until tender. Reduce oven to 200째C/180째C fan-forced.
Spread 1/2 cup pasta sauce over base of an 18 x 28cm (4cm deep) baking dish. Arrange one-third of the eggplant, in a single layer, over tomato mixture to cover base.

Spoon over one-third of the remaining pasta sauce. Sprinkle over one-third each of the grana padano and basil. Repeat layering with half each of the remaining eggplant, pasta sauce, grana padano and basil.
Top with remaining eggplant, pasta sauce, grana padano and mozzarella. Bake for 30 minutes or until bubbling and golden. Stand for 5 minutes. Serve scattered with remaining basil.
